register.title: Registration
register.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 2 characters long
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.passwordMessage: Secure your account with a unique password that doesn’t include names, dates and/or repeating characters.
register.registerConditions: By registering, you accept our general conditions of use and sale. Read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

recovery.messageEmail: We emailed you a six-digit code to {{email}}. Enter the code below to confirm your email address.
recovery.messagePhone: We sent you a six-digit code to {{phone}}. Enter the code below to confirm your phone number.

success.changePwdMessage: You have successfully changed your password.
success.recoveryMessage: You have successfully verified your account.

createPassword.title: Create your password
createPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
createPassword.passwordMessage: Secure your account with a unique password that doesn’t include names, dates and/or repeating characters.
